{"id":968156421,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1686410816,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/968156421/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Semi-Repetitive Substring","memory":"44.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int longestSemiRepetitiveSubstring(String s) {\n        int ans=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length()-1;i++){\n            int j=i;\n            boolean  first=false;\n            boolean got=false;\n            while(j<s.length() && !got ){\n                if( j !=i && s.charAt(j)==s.charAt(j-1)){\n                    if(!first){\n                        first=true;\n                    }\n                    else{\n                        got=true;\n                    }\n                    \n                }\n                j++;\n                \n                \n            }\n           \n            if(got){\n                ans=Math.max(ans,j-i-1);\n            }\n            else{\n                ans=Math.max(ans,j-i);\n                \n            }\n            \n        }\n        if(ans==0){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-semi-repetitive-substring","has_notes":false}
